simplified_text:
You can check out my “hour tally” online. It’s called “Deep Habits: Should You Track Hours or Milestones?” You can find it at this link: March 23, 2014, http://calnewport.com/blog/2014/03/23/deep-habits-should-you-track-hours-or-milestones/.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The passage shares a link to a blog post about tracking hours versus milestones in developing good habits. It encourages readers to explore the topic further.
